name: Showdown Pro v4.03 (BETA)
description:
This theme aims to help more experienced players have a better experience playing. 

It removes things that are not needed necessarily such as:

- The "Attack" and "Switch" Text
- The Personal Trainer Sprite
- Borders between the gameplay and the battle log
- Long vertical boxes for each sides. 

It adds some quality of life changes:

- Maximizes open window space.
- Updated Sword and Shield Backgrounds
- Updated Weather Effects
- Information on Log is more distinguishable between types of information (Event & Damage) so that players can find important information faster when they scroll, hopefully. Separator line added to help further assist.
additional_info:
v4.03
- Images now hosted on upgraded/secure hosting to help prevent loading issues.

v4.00
- New Isle of Armor Battle Backgrounds 
- Removed Grey/Blank Battle Background
- Opponent's Showdown Rank now shows without needing to hover trainersprite!

v3.00
- New weather, terrain visuals! 
- More Sword/Shield Backgrounds.
- Added YOUR trainer back.
- UI Updates.
- Bug fixes

v2.00
- Icon infusing for various categories (highlighted events, timers, turn headings, quick info)
- Fixed showdown lounge chats spacing.
- Removed unnecessary dividers in battle log.
- Dark mode is not a complete nightmare now.

In the next couple of updates: More Sword/Shield backgrounds, Better background swapping between battles that doesn't require page refresh, Easier-on-the-senses weather effects, Updated terrain visuals.

In the longterm future: Slightly animated backgrounds, New battle layout rearrangement, Alternate skins for different design themes (league battles, etc), Elo displaying on layout for opponent instead of on hover, more quality of life improvements based on feedback/what's actually possible with just css changes. 

v1.06
- Hopefully fixed issue where font changes were universal no matter what the website (for real).

v1.05
- Hopefully fixed issue where font changes were universal no matter what the website.

v1.04
- Changed colors of secondary chat text and div lines to be more dark-mode friendly.

v1.03
- Fixed Chat/Battle Timer Spacing Issue

v1.02 
- Battle Log text segments visual improvements.
- Removed dot from on tooltip hover.
- Moved opponent tooltip hover a little lower to be more aligned with the 1st player hover.
- Hopefully fixed Ubuntu font import.
